Sentencas: To predict the warpage behaviour of an anode-supported half-cell of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), a viscoelastic analysis has been made for a system with Gd-doped ceria (GDC) and NiO-yttria stabilized zirconia (NiO-YSZ) bi-layers.
Titulo: Characterization of warpage behaviour of Gd-doped ceria/NiO-yttria stabilized zirconia bi-layer samples for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The viscoelastic properties of each component at 1573 K are measured by discontinuous sinter forging (for GDC) and continuous sinter forging (for NiO-YSZ) techniques.
Titulo: Characterization of warpage behaviour of Gd-doped ceria/NiO-yttria stabilized zirconia bi-layer samples for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: Using the measured uniaxial viscosities and the viscous Poisson ratio, the warpage during the co-firing of a GDC/NiO-YSZ bi-layer is calculated for the continuum mechanical models of Cai et al.
Titulo: Characterization of warpage behaviour of Gd-doped ceria/NiO-yttria stabilized zirconia bi-layer samples for solid oxide fuel cell application
Characterization of warpage behaviour of Gd-doped ceria/NiO-yttria stabilized zirconia bi-layer samples for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The warpage predicted by the two models, in particular that of Cai et al., is shown to be in good quantitative agreement with the experimental observation.
Titulo: Characterization of warpage behaviour of Gd-doped ceria/NiO-yttria stabilized zirconia bi-layer samples for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: This result demonstrates that the warpage of bi-layer samples during co-firing can be suitably predicted when the viscoelastic properties of each component are properly measured and estimated.
Titulo: Characterization of warpage behaviour of Gd-doped ceria/NiO-yttria stabilized zirconia bi-layer samples for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The present investigation also provides a useful methodology for optimizing the design of planar asymmetric half-cells for the SOFC industry.
Titulo: Characterization of warpage behaviour of Gd-doped ceria/NiO-yttria stabilized zirconia bi-layer samples for solid oxide fuel cell application
Characterization of warpage behaviour of Gd-doped ceria/NiO-yttria stabilized zirconia bi-layer samples for solid oxide fuel cell application
Characterization of warpage behaviour of Gd-doped ceria/NiO-yttria stabilized zirconia bi-layer samples for solid oxide fuel cell application
